issue.title: Find ign math package fails in windows

content.raw:
As of `sdf3`, we are appending the variable `IGNITION-MATH_REQUIRED_MAJOR_VERSION` to `ignition-math` in the `find_package` call:

* #!/osrf/sdformat/src/sdf3/cmake/sdf_config.cmake.in#sdf_config.cmake.in-25

This variable is set in [cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake](#!/osrf/sdformat/src/sdf3/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake#SearchForStuff.cmake-124). I wonder if this is not being set properly during configuration?

Which sdformat branch are you using?
content.html:
